class.name: DojoEditorPlugin
class.brief_description: An editor plugin for managing Dojo configuration and tools.
class.description: The DojoEditorPlugin class integrates Dojo tools into the Godot editor, providing options to manage project settings, check for updates, and print version information.

method.name: check_for_updates
method.description: Checks for updates to the Godot-Dojo plugin.

method.name: init_setting
method.description: Initializes a specific setting with a value.

method.name: print_version
method.description: Prints the current version of the Godot-Dojo plugin.

method.name: reset_project_settings
method.description: Resets the Dojo project settings to their default values.

members.member: Indicates whether the plugin is enabled.
